## addMethod variable

函数“addMethod”向对象添加新方法，同时保留任何具有相同名称的现有方法的功能。

**Signature:**

```typescript
addMethod: (object: paramsObj, name: string, fn: Function) => void
```

## Example


```ts
const obj = {}
addMethod(obj, 'greet', function (a:number,b:string) {  ...todo  })
obj.greet(1,'2')
addMethod(obj, 'greet', function (a:number) {  ...todo  })
obj.greet(1)
```
